text: Everton de Viña del Mar, is a Chilean football club based in Viña del Mar. The club was founded in 1909, and now plays in first chilean football league. Their home matches are played at Sausalito stadium, which has a capacity of approximately 25,000 seats. == Honours == * National champions: 1950, 1952, 1976 * Copa Chile champions: 1984 * Second Division champions: 1974, 1982, 2003 == References == == Other websites == * Everton VM official website Everton Category:1909 establishments Category:1900s establishments in South America Category:20th-century establishments in Chile
title: Everton de Viña del Mar
